patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Patch Available
patch.message:
The site is running 5.15.0. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.15.1 (2019-07-10): Fix recent regressions involving a refund use-case, a contribution report, and D8 CLI support.
  • 5.15.2 (2019-07-31): Fix recent issues regarding search selections, activity custom data, a contribution message, and a MySQL status check.

upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Upgrade Available
